   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to listwiz's documentation!
===================================

Welcome to the documentation of `listwiz`. This tool allows you to handle lists:
sort them, find the longest increasing streaks, and identify the most frequently
occurring elements.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
